Issue.creator: jsmitchell
Issue.summary: Validator forward progress occasionally halts on cessation of input workload
Issue.description: Using smallbank-tp-go and submitting smallbank workload, a pending queue of several thousand batches was built up. At the point where the workload was interrupted, block publishing ceased (the system appeared to be in a hung state). When workload was resumed, block publishing continued, and kept going after a second stoppage of the workload process.
